mjc.error

Class MiniJavaError

  • java.lang.Object
    • mjc.error.MiniJavaError

  • public final class MiniJavaError
extends java.lang.Object
    The MiniJavaError class represents an error in the input program.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MiniJavaError

        MiniJavaError(int line,
             int column,
             MiniJavaErrorType type,
             java.lang.Object[] args)
        Constructs a new error. Errors are usually not created explicitly (which is why this constructor is package private), but by using the MiniJavaErrorType.on(int, int, Object...) factory method.
        Parameters:
        line - Line of the error.
        column - Column of the error.
        type - Type of the error.
        args - Arguments for the error message (as defined by the type).
